name: Graft
description:
"Graft" is a local-multiplayer video game, were players have to create paper craft animals. Up to 8 people can play, sharing their controllers.

Game controllers are required

You can download it or play it on the web browser. Full-Screen recommended.

Please let me know what you think in the comments!

CONTROLS
// Players 1, 3, 5, and 7 use the left side of the controller
// Players 2, 4, 6, 8 use the right side of the controller.
(You can also play alone, controlling two player cursors)

- Use the sticks to move your player cursor.
- Hold the triggers to grab pieces of paper.
- Use DOWN + LEFT or A + B to rotate pieces.
